attributes.action: refuse a Peerage to the disgraceful Michael (Gorbals Mick) Martin, yet another example of poor performance being rewarded in public life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely this Government cannot be sufficiently thick skinned not to recognise that the British public is horrified by the elevation of this man to the House of Lords. When will they get the message?
